DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine efficacy Traumeel S ( ointment gel ) compare another antiinflammatory drug call Diclofenac patient sprain ankle .
DOC.brief_title: TAASS-Traumeel Ointment Gel Compared With Topical NSAID Athletes With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: Study objective confirmatory proof efficacy TraumeelÂ® S topical treatment , ointment gel , compare diclofenac topical treatment patient ankle sprain . In addition tolerability/safety drug preparation compare , benefit-risk relation determine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Athletes acute unilateral ankle sprain lateral ligament ankle joint male female Moderate ( 3060 mm ) severe ( > 60 mm ) pain accord patient 's assessment ankle pain visual analogue scale ( VAS ) weight bearing , unable perform normal train / sport activity 18 40 year age injury occur within 24 hour first dose study medication Willing able give write informed consent Available duration study Similar injury affect joint within past 6 month bilateral ankle injury bed rest , hospitalization , surgery use nonremovable rigid cast Clinically important abnormality screen laboratory test Debilitating acute chronic illness Use corticosteroids previous 8 week , analgesic previous 6 hour , 24 hour case longacting NSAID , COX2 specific inhibitor , tramadol History sensitivity component study drug Unwilling unable comply requirement protocol Participation study within 4 week prior study entry study participation Current substance alcohol abuse opinion investigator would interfere compliance interpretation study result
